item.title: Sparc Electrex Promoter Shobha Hegde Sells 1.15 Lakh Shares in Open Market Transaction
item.description: Top News Sparc Electrex Promoter Shobha Hegde Sells 1.15 Lakh Shares in Open Market Transaction 3 minutes ago Sparc Electrex promoter Shobha Anant Hegde sold 1,15,000 equity shares through open market on December 10, 2025, reducing her individual shareholding from 3.09% to 2.50%. The combined PAC holdings decreased from 27.12% to 26.53%. The transaction was disclosed under SEBI regulations on December 11, 2025, with proper regulatory compliance maintained throughout the process.

item.title: Lasa Supergenerics Whole-time Director Prathmesh Chalke Resigns Effective December 31, 2025
item.description: Lasa Supergenerics Whole-time Director Prathmesh Chalke Resigns Effective December 31, 2025 6 minutes ago Lasa Supergenerics Limited announced the resignation of Whole-time Director Mr. Prathmesh Chalke (DIN: 11119348), effective December 31, 2025. The director confirmed no material reasons for resignation beyond those in his December 11, 2025 letter, expressing gratitude for his tenure and commitment to smooth transition. The company informed BSE and NSE in compliance with SEBI Regulation 30 requirements.

item.title: Novelix Pharmaceuticals Board Approves ₹15 Crore Preferential Allotment
item.description: Novelix Pharmaceuticals Board Approves ₹15 Crore Preferential Allotment 2 minutes ago Novelix Pharmaceuticals Limited's board has approved a preferential allotment of 25,00,000 equity shares at ₹60.00 per share to raise ₹15.00 crores. The allocation covers 40 investors including promoter group members and non-promoters, with the largest allocation of 3,25,000 shares going to promoter group member Pavani Vupparapalli. An Extraordinary General Meeting is scheduled for January 9, 2026, to seek shareholder approval for this capital raising initiative.

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 22 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.
